name: Advanced Nanomaterials Congress
content: The Advanced Nanomaterials Congress (AMC Nano) is aimed to offer an opportunity to promote intensive discussions and collaborations among participants to enhance and widen the knowledge of NANO meter size Advanced Materials research and to surge innovation and responsiveness for the technological needs in the areas of Nanotechnology. The AMC Nano will run with ‘Onsite- Online- On-demand’ Hybrid Setups. This format will give an opportunity for joining the congress either Physical (Join at Venue) or Online (Live/ On Demand).
